name: Dirt Buster
description:
Your one wish is to crush the dirt and stool with the most amazing multicleaner-tool

Play as Joan, as you take on the hardest jobs yet. Will you be able to clean it all, or will the dirt consume you? Grab your multicleaner-tool and make the world a cleaner place.

This shoot-em-up was made by 12 first year students at The Game Assembly in Sweden, working half time (4 hours a day) for 8 weeks.
